members.name: Dad
members.bio: Dad is the pillar of the family. He is passionate about gardening and loves to tinker in the garage. Always ready to help and support his loved ones, he embodies stability and reliability.

members.name: Mom
members.bio: Mom is the heart of the home. She loves cooking delicious meals for the family and taking care of the vegetable garden. Her kindness and love for her loved ones make her an exceptional person.

members.name: Daughter
members.bio: Our daughter is an aspiring artist. She spends her days drawing and painting, filling the house with colors. Her creativity and zest for life are contagious.

members.name: Son
members.bio: Our son is a little adventurer. He loves exploring nature and spending time playing with his friends. Always on the lookout for new discoveries, he surprises us every day with his curiosity.

members.name: Grandpa
members.hobbies: Telling stories, Spending time with his grandchildren
members.bio: Grandpa is the memory of the family. He loves telling stories from his past and sharing his wisdom with the grandchildren. His presence brings unmatched warmth and depth.

members.name: Friend
members.bio: Our friend is almost a family member. He is always there to support us and share joyful moments. His generosity and humor make him a cherished person.
